definition: see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure
bad/spoiled/broken/to break down/(suffix) to the utmost

sentences.english: The heavy bag made the chair broken.
sentences.chinese: 這個重重的包把椅子壓壞了。

sentences.english: Don't crush this box; there are flowers inside.
sentences.chinese: 別把這個盒子壓壞了，裏面有花。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, almost all adjacent filling bodies have been damaged with poor mining security.
sentences.chinese: 相鄰充填體幾乎均發生壓壞現象，進路回採安全性差。

sentences.english: If the tree falls that way, it will destroy the house.
sentences.chinese: 這棵樹向那邊倒下就會把那所房子壓壞。

sentences.english: This additional pressure eventually weakens the spider assembly causing it to fail prematurely.
sentences.chinese: 這些額外壓力最終壓壞連接柄組件，導致其提前報銷。

sentences.english: He crushed the table by sitting on it.
sentences.chinese: 他坐在桌子上把它壓壞了。

definition: lit. not even the chickens and dogs are left undisturbed (idiom)/fig. great commotion/pandemonium
When you enter a country, follow the local customs (idiom); do as the natives do/When in Rome, do as the Romans do
clever and eloquent (idiom); fluent/having the gift of the gab
to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom)/to kick people around
altar lamp burning day and night
see the opportunity and act (idiom); to act according to circumstances/to play it by ear/to use one's discretion
